General.Name: Sam Chun Dang Pharm. Co. Ltd
General.Description: Sam Chun Dang Pharm. Co., Ltd manufactures, distributes, imports, and exports pharmaceuticals in South Korea. It provides ophthalmology, cardiovascular, endocrinology, antibacterial, anti-fungal, antiviral, respiratory, anti-inflammatory, antihistamine, and musculoskeletal products, as well as vitamins and gastro intestine products. The company was founded in 1943 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
